title: Embed/ Add LIVE Power BI reports in PowerPoint (free solution)
excerpt: If you want to embed Power BI reports and interact with them inside PowerPoint, I have the tutorial for you!  Check the announcement here! Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw?sub_confirmation=1
